name: Eye of the Beholder (itch) (benhen_26)
description:
Eye of the Beholder is a suspenseful arcade platformer where you collect gems and hide from a giant eye.

You play as a mysterious cloaked figure who is stuck in a horrific purgatory like state where he is always watched by a giant eye. If the eye sees him, he will be killed. It is up to you to control this cloaked figure and hide from the eye while collecting gems. 

Press the A and D keys to move left and right and the space key to jump.

This game was made for the weekly trijam game jam in three hours with the theme, hide or get caught. All art was made by me in Gamemaker studio 2 and all sounds are from Freesound.org.

How many gems can you collect before the all seeing eye catches you?
